title: How do you check who you recently reported
body: I just got a message that notified me that a person I reported recently got punished, and I completely forgot who I reported. I was wondering if I could check who I recently reported so I could at least know who got punished because of my report. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: We don't disclose who it was that got punished because we don't want that person getting any sort of backlash. The message you see is just a reminder that reports *do* work.
